text: We are unable to send jms application properties to the jms receiver using jmeter. other properties is commonly used, and jmeter doesn't support this feature. requesting you to add this feature.
creator: deepaktaker@gmail.com

text:
Hello,
YOu can send through JMS Point-to-Point but not through JMS Publisher.
Is this your requirement ?
Thank you
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text: We have lot of scenario where we need to send jms properties through jms publisher. i would request you guys to implement the feature that you have to jms point to point to jms publisher.
creator: deepaktaker@gmail.com
